## Slide

* RevealJS slides are real powerful
* Master it to precisely control and tune the layout and appearence
:::

::: column
```{python}
#| code-line-numbers: "|6|9"

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)
theta = 2 * np.pi * r
fig, ax = plt.subplots(subplot_kw={'projection': 'polar'})
ax.plot(theta, r)
ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1, 1.5, 2])
ax.grid(True)
plt.show()
```
